title: Launching php process only works with -x
body:
All though the `README.md` lists `pm2 start echo.php` as the syntax for starting php scripts with pm2, 
it fails with the following error if the `-x` flag isn't set (`pm2 start -x echo.php`):

```
[test.php-0 (err) 2014-08-13T14:28:09] /home/vagrant/echo.php:1
[test.php-0 (err) 2014-08-13T14:28:09] (function (exports, require, module, __filename, __dirname) { <?php
[test.php-0 (err) 2014-08-13T14:28:09]                                                               ^
[test.php-0 (err) 2014-08-13T14:28:09] SyntaxError: Unexpected token <
[test.php-0 (err) 2014-08-13T14:28:09]   at exports.runInThisContext (vm.js:69:16)
[test.php-0 (err) 2014-08-13T14:28:09]   at Module._compile (module.js:432:25)
[test.php-0 (err) 2014-08-13T14:28:09]   at Object.Module._extensions..js (module.js:467:10)
[test.php-0 (err) 2014-08-13T14:28:09]   at Module.load (/usr/local/lib/node_modules/pm2/node_modules/coffee-script/lib/coffee-script/register.js:45:36)
[test.php-0 (err) 2014-08-13T14:28:09]   at Function.Module._load (module.js:305:12)
[test.php-0 (err) 2014-08-13T14:28:09]   at Module.require (module.js:357:17)
[test.php-0 (err) 2014-08-13T14:28:09]   at require (module.js:373:17)
[test.php-0 (err) 2014-08-13T14:28:09]   at /usr/local/lib/node_modules/pm2/lib/ProcessContainer.js:197:5
[test.php-0 (err) 2014-08-13T14:28:09]   at WriteStream.<anonymous> (/usr/local/lib/node_modules/pm2/lib/ProcessContainer.js:140:9)
[test.php-0 (err) 2014-08-13T14:28:09]   at WriteStream.EventEmitter.emit (events.js:107:17)
[test.php-0 (err) 2014-08-13T14:28:09]   at WriteStream.<anonymous> (fs.js:1668:10)
[test.php-0 (err) 2014-08-13T14:28:09]   at Object.oncomplete (fs.js:97:15)
```

The same thing happens if I try to set the interpreter: `pm2 start --interpreter php echo.php`.

Seems like it tries to interpret it as `coffeescript` when the `-x` flag isn't included..
